TopicTitle: Anyone know how to use KAS and Modular Multiwheels mod?

Articles.Content:
Edit: Problem solved

Edited April 24, 2013 by Stealth2668

Where do you install the ".cs" files that come in the "source" folder with the K.A.S. mod? Also, how do you power the truck wheels in the "Modular Multiwheels and Omniwheels" mod? I can only turn them but the don't move (drive forward). I have fuel and electrical power, a set of turning wheels and regular trailer wheels.

Nowhere. Generally if a mod comes with a "Source" folder, that's for if you want to edit the mod for any reason, it's the source code. Don't install the source..

As for modular multi-wheels.. I don't know.. Does it depend on other mods to operate? I've never experienced many issues with it.

Some mods it may require (because other mods I've used sometimes require these)

-CleverBobCat.dll (Bobcat's cart addon for rovers before .19 when they were implemented.

-MuMechLib.dll (MechJeb, some use this for..reasons I don't know. The release candidates of MechJeb (like, 2.0.whatever) or later are called MechJeb2.dll and will not fulfill this need.)

Uhh.. Check the readme file..

Else, maybe it's something to do with setting up action groups? Do the wheels need to be "enabled" or something?

Do they require more electricity than you're able to supply?

You say "Turning Wheels" and "Trailer Wheels" like they're specific types of wheels... Is there by any chance a "Drive Wheel" or something like that? (Assuming steering wheels can roll and steer, trailer wheels can only roll, and the power wheels can roll but also provide power, but cannot steer...?) I don't know, I've never used the mod very in depth... All I can say is consult the readme and if that fails, try getting ahold of the mod owner.

I'm just kinda giving a general troubleshooting overview, someone else might have more specific info..

Also, request mod to move this to How To.

Edited April 24, 2013 by M5000

Since I'm a moron, I realized there are wheels that are "powered" and others that are not. They don't need any resources to run either.

Here's my lift truck I built.

Also thanks for the info M5000

Because this thing is probably too big, plus these wheels can bring me to 80m/s

How do I message a mod to move this to How To?
I have a problem with this mod (and some others). its not compatible with 0.21.1, when i star the game, all crafts with stock parts are not loaded

It is compatible, but I recommend going through and updating all the parts to the new format. That is, putting

PART

{

At the begining of the part, and

}

At the end.

Then make a folder called TT or multiwheels, or somthing, them put them in place. Hopefully, it works for you too.
Lol, this is an old thread. It said "Started by Stealth2668..." I'm like WTH? I didn't start this! Turns out I did... Like 3 months ago.
